text: Sorik Sensos ([[half-elf]] councilor for [[Middle Central]]) is a clever man and a brilliant orator, and he is one of the oldest and most influential voices on the Council. However, he is influenced by his need for gold, and his supporters are aggravated by the growing economic gap between [[Middle|Middle Central]] and [[Upper Central]]. His frustration is compounded by the rising success of [[Javan Tomollan]], and every month he becomes increasingly obsessed with Tomollan. Sorik is determined to humiliate Javan and to bring down his fortunes, but he needs to be careful.
title: Sorik Sensos
tooltip: Middle Central representative on the Sharn Council
